stratagems.name: CHOSEN FOR GLORY
stratagems.legend: Within the massed ranks of a heretic cult, only a few are marked for greatness.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One DAMNED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Desperate Pact. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if your unit did not fail the resulting Leadership test when making that Desperate Pact, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.target: One DAMNED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.

If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if your unit did not fail the resulting Leadership test when making that Desperate Pact, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.name: MORTAL THRALLS
stratagems.legend: Disciples of the Chaos Gods think nothing of sacrificing their lesser thralls to protect those of greater worth.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected ts targets.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking units attacks, and one friendly DAMNED unit within 3" of your unit and visible to both your unit and the attacking unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, while your DAMNED unit is on the battlefield, each time your opponent would make a Wound roll for an attack that targets your HERETIC ASTARTES unit, if your DAMNED unit is visible to the attacking model and is an eligible target for that attack, no roll is made; instead, your DAMNED unit suffers a number of mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic of that attack.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected ts targets.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking units attacks, and one friendly DAMNED unit within 3" of your unit and visible to both your unit and the attacking unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, while your DAMNED unit is on the battlefield, each time your opponent would make a Wound roll for an attack that targets your HERETIC ASTARTES unit, if your DAMNED unit is visible to the attacking model and is an eligible target for that attack, no roll is made; instead, your DAMNED unit suffers a number of mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.name: RECKLESS HASTE
stratagems.legend: Consumed by a desire to spill blood, these fanatical heretics hurl themselves towards the foe.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase TARGET: One DAMNED unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase
stratagems.target: One DAMNED unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: SELFLESS DEMISE
stratagems.legend: The zealous followers of the Dark Gods are devoted to the last. As death comes they strike a desperate final blow in hope of reward.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DAMNED unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the attacking unit has resolved all of its attacks, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, roll one D6 on a 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DAMNED unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has resolved all of its attacks, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, roll one D6 on a 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.

stratagems.name: MASTERS ARE WATCHING
stratagems.type: Creations of Bile – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Feeling the expectant gaze of Bile’s greatest creations from across the battlefield, transhuman and mortal warriors strive slavishly to impress.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, subtracting 1 from the result if it is a DAMNED unit: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, subtracting 1 from the result if it is a DAMNED unit: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: DELAYED MUTATIONS
stratagems.type: Creations of Bile – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Fabius Bile’s experiments are notoriously unstable. In the heat of battle, new mutations may burst forth in explosions of gristle and oozing gore, many of which are as lethal to the subject as they are to the enemy.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit (excluding DAMNED units) from your army.EFFECT: Your unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Then select one augmentation (see Experimental Augmentations). Until the start of your next Command phase, models in your unit have the selected augmentation in addition to any other augmentations they have.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit (excluding DAMNED units) from your army.
stratagems.effect: Your unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Then select one augmentation (see Experimental Augmentations). Until the start of your next Command phase, models in your unit have the selected augmentation in addition to any other augmentations they have.

stratagems.name: DIABOLIC REGENERATION
stratagems.type: Creations of Bile – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Not even death can lay the most vile of Bile’s creations low.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit (excluding DAMNED units) from your army.EFFECT: One destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) is returned to your unit. If your unit is a BATTLELINE unit, D3 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTER models) are returned to your unit instead.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit (excluding DAMNED units) from your army.
stratagems.effect: One destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) is returned to your unit. If your unit is a BATTLELINE unit, D3 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTER models) are returned to your unit instead.

stratagems.name: AUTOSTIMULANTS
stratagems.type: Creations of Bile – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Arrays of subdermal vials inject autostimulants and biocatalysts into the warriors’ enhanced muscles, invigorating them for incredible feats of exertion.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your Charge phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
stratagems.when: Start of your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: MONSTROUS VISAGES
stratagems.type: Creations of Bile – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Bile’s experimental ministrations have left these warriors as freakish monsters. Cursed with clusters of compound eyes, distended, fang-stuffed jaws or myriad other grotesqueries, they are hideous to behold.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: SPECIMENS FOR THE SPIDER
stratagems.type: Creations of Bile – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Clonefather’s agents are always searching for new test subjects. They strive to harvest the bodies of great leaders and champions, dragging them from battle and leaving the remaining foes utterly demoralised.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll. After your unit has fought, if one or more enemy CHARACTER models were destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one enemy unit within 6" of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the enemy WARLORD was destroyed as a result of those attacks, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test instead.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll. After your unit has fought, if one or more enemy CHARACTER models were destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one enemy unit within 6" of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the enemy WARLORD was destroyed as a result of those attacks, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test instead.

stratagems.name: FROM ALL SIDES
stratagems.legend: When the assault comes, it does so swiftly and without warning.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your Charge phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to Charge rolls made for your unit for each other HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that made a Charge move this phase (to a maximum of +3)
stratagems.when: Start of your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to Charge rolls made for your unit for each other HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that made a Charge move this phase (to a maximum of +3)

stratagems.name: PICK THEM OFF
stratagems.legend: The Heretic Astartes are pitiless reavers, targeting weak points in the enemy line with ruthless efficiency.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll. If the target is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll. If the target is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.name: SCRAMBLED COORDINATES
stratagems.legend: Employing fell techno-sorcery, the Heretic Astartes disroot enemy navigational cogitators and scramble teleporter beacons.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of the Reinforcements step of your opponent’s Movement phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" horizontally of your unit.
stratagems.when: Start of the Reinforcements step of your opponent’s Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" horizontally of your unit.

stratagems.name: RELENTLESS PURSUIT
stratagems.legend: These warriors stalk their assigned target with dogged determination, reacting to their every move
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.name: COILS OF DECEPTION
stratagems.legend: Some Heretic Astartes are masters of deceit, often feigning retreat only to open fire from close range.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.TARGET: That HERETIC ASTARTES unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.target: That HERETIC ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back

stratagems.name: DETONATOR
stratagems.legend: These warriors employ expert saboteurs who utilise melta charges and improvised explosives to sow destruction.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase, just after an enemy model with the Deadly Demise ability (excluding TITANIC models) is destroyedTARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that was within 18" of that enemy model when it was destroyed.EFFECT: Your opponent does not roll to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by their model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted (if that ability inflicts a random number of mortal wounds, your opponent rolls to determine that number as normal).
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an enemy model with the Deadly Demise ability (excluding TITANIC models) is destroyed
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that was within 18" of that enemy model when it was destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Your opponent does not roll to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by their model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted (if that ability inflicts a random number of mortal wounds, your opponent rolls to determine that number as normal).

stratagems.name: PITILESS HUNTERS
stratagems.legend: These predatory warriors sense weakness as the hydra shark smells blood, sating their bloodlust upon the fearful and wounded.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from  your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Battle-shocked and/or Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from  your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Battle-shocked and/or Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: DEPTHLESS CRUELTY
stratagems.legend: Terror troops such as these inflict agonies upon their victims with malicious relish, targeting the weakened and wounded without pity
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phaseTARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Battle-shocked and/or Below Half-strength, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
stratagems.when: Fight phase
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Battle-shocked and/or Below Half-strength, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: BLOODY EXAMPLE
stratagems.legend: The violent and bloody slaughter of the enemy’s leadership hurls their followers into abject panic.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army destroys a CHARACTER unit.TARGET: That HERETIC ASTARTES unit.EFFECT: Each enemy unit within 12" of and visible to your unit must take a Battle-shock test.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army destroys a CHARACTER unit.
stratagems.target: That HERETIC ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effect: Each enemy unit within 12" of and visible to your unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: MERCILESS PURSUIT
stratagems.legend: The Heretic Astartes allow none to flee the battle, pursuing their broken foes with relentless savagery.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is not within Engagement range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that Fell Back this turn and is within 6" of your unit. Your unit can  declare a charge as if it were your Charge phase. When doing so, you can only select that enemy  unit as the target of that charge (and only if it is an eligible target). Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is not within Engagement range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that Fell Back this turn and is within 6" of your unit. Your unit can  declare a charge as if it were your Charge phase. When doing so, you can only select that enemy  unit as the target of that charge (and only if it is an eligible target). Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

stratagems.name: RELENTLESS TERROR
stratagems.legend: These warriors strike in screaming waves, each charge as brutal as the last.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army Falls Back.TARGET: That HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit. EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.target: That HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.name: SCREAMING DESCENT
stratagems.legend: Jump pack borne warriors descend from the skies, terrifying screams emanating from their vox-grilles as they plummet towards their prey.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, from the second battle round onwards.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army that is in Reserves.EFFECT: Set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all  enemy units, but until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge. Then select one enemy INFANTRY or MOUNTED unit within 9" of and visible to your unit: that unit must take a Battle-shock test.
stratagems.when: Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, from the second battle round onwards.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army that is in Reserves.
stratagems.effect: Set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all  enemy units, but until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge. Then select one enemy INFANTRY or MOUNTED unit within 9" of and visible to your unit: that unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: PERSISTENT ASSAILANTS
stratagems.legend: These iron-willed warriors refuse to retreat, even i the face of overwhelming odds. Mounting losses serve only to drive them forward
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more attacks this phase and has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if your unit is Below Half-strength you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more attacks this phase and has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if your unit is Below Half-strength you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.name: PITILESS CANNONADE
stratagems.legend: These warriors focus their ire upon a wounded foe, combining fire to fell their target in a cavalcade of destructive force.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit  that is Below Half-strength, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit  that is Below Half-strength, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit

stratagems.name: POINT-BLANK DESTRUCTION
stratagems.legend: Even in the press of combat, the Heretic Astartes bring heavy weapons to bear, shattering fortifications and obliterating enemy infantry.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phaseTARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit’s ranged weapons (excluding Blast weapons) have the  [PISTOL] ability.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit’s ranged weapons (excluding Blast weapons) have the  [PISTOL] ability.

stratagems.name: BRUTAL ATTRITION
stratagems.legend: These implacable soldiers weather the enemy's fury before striking back in kind, to devastating effect.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack is allocated to your unit, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6 (to maximum of six D6 per attacking unit): for each 4+, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack is allocated to your unit, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6 (to maximum of six D6 per attacking unit): for each 4+, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.name: SIEGECRAFT
stratagems.legend: Veterans of countless grinding sieges, these Heretic Astartes repel and pin down wave after wave of foes with rapid boltgun fire and accurate artillery.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your opponents Charge phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as a target of a charge,  subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).
stratagems.when: Start of your opponents Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as a target of a charge,  subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

stratagems.name: STEADFAST DETERMINATION
stratagems.legend: These warriors possess endless endurance and are capable of weathering untold hardships in order to destroy their foes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

stratagems.name: INVETERATE MURDERERS
stratagems.legend: So long have these warriors fought and killed their way across the galaxy that they have become experts in finding the weak spots of even the hardiest foes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is less than or equal to the Toughness characteristic of the target, add 1 to the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is less than or equal to the Toughness characteristic of the target, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: LOW CUNNING
stratagems.legend: Disabused of such notions as honour or self-sacrifice, Chaos Space Marines use every trick and cunning ruse to ensure their own survival.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: CRUEL EXECUTION
stratagems.legend: Veteran killers all, these warriors will exploit the slightest enemy misstep to simply move back and gun their victims down in cold blood.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units).EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units).
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.name: NEXT PRIZE
stratagems.legend: The Long Waris gruelling and requires endless captured materiel to wage. Thus this warband are forever searching for the next cache of arms or riches to loot with rapacious eagerness.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army has Secured an objective marker, or your Movement phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army has opened a Hatchway.TARGET: That HERETIC ASTARTES unit.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3". If this Stratagem is used in your Movement phase, at least one model from your unit must end that move on the opposite side of the Hatchway from the one it started the phase on.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army has Secured an objective marker, or your Movement phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army has opened a Hatchway.
stratagems.target: That HERETIC ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3". If this Stratagem is used in your Movement phase, at least one model from your unit must end that move on the opposite side of the Hatchway from the one it started the phase on.

stratagems.name: PROFANE ZEAL
stratagems.legend: Those Heretic Astartes sworn to the service of the Dark Gods display zeal through violence.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHAOS UNDIVIDED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHAOS UNDIVIDED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: EYE OF THE GODS
stratagems.legend: The eyes of the Dark Gods fall upon those who slaughter in their name.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army (excluding  DAMNED, DAEMON and EPIC HERO units) destroys a enemy unit.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER model in that unit. EFFECT: Until the end of the battle, add 1 to the Move, Toughness and Wounds characteristics of that  CHARACTER model, and add 1 to the Attacks. Strength and Damage characteristics of that CHARACTER model’s melee weapons.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army (excluding  DAMNED, DAEMON and EPIC HERO units) destroys a enemy unit.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER model in that unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the battle, add 1 to the Move, Toughness and Wounds characteristics of that  CHARACTER model, and add 1 to the Attacks. Strength and Damage characteristics of that CHARACTER model’s melee weapons.

stratagems.name: SKINSHIFT
stratagems.legend: Those who offer praise to the God of Change may gam the benefits of his mutagenic powers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.EFFECT: One model in your unit regains up to 3 lost wounds. In addition, if your unit is a TZEENTCH unit below its Starting Strength, one destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) is returned to your unit with its full wounds remaining.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: One model in your unit regains up to 3 lost wounds. In addition, if your unit is a TZEENTCH unit below its Starting Strength, one destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) is returned to your unit with its full wounds remaining.

stratagems.name: ETERNAL HATE
stratagems.legend: The Blood God’s thirst can never be slaked.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if it is a KHORNE unit: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if it is a KHORNE unit: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: TORPEFYING REFRAIN
stratagems.legend: As these warriors traverse the battlefield, an unnatural symphony of hypnotic music accompanies their every move, stupefying their enemies.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit is a SLAANESH unit, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit is a SLAANESH unit, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

stratagems.name: FESTERING MIASMA
stratagems.legend: A roiling storm of warp energy obscures the Heretic Astartes, leaving their foes shooting at indistinct shadows.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability. In addition, if your unit is a NURGLE unit, it can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability. In addition, if your unit is a NURGLE unit, it can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

stratagems.name: UNFAILINGLY OBDURATE
stratagems.legend: Such is their determination to claim their due that these warriors will gladly weather a storm of fire.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: SCOUR AND SEIZE
stratagems.legend: If the bounty is to be claimed, the foe must first be purged.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within range of an objective marker, that attack has the [PRECISION] ability.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within range of an objective marker, that attack has the [PRECISION] ability.

stratagems.name: RUINOUS RAID
stratagems.legend: Utilising their swift transports, these ravagers plunge through the enemy lines to assault key positions.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or your Fight phase TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a  model in your unit makes an attack, if the target of that attack is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a  model in your unit makes an attack, if the target of that attack is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: OPPORTUNISTIC RAIDERS
stratagems.legend: Mobility is the key to victory These Heretic Astartes raiders outmanoeuvre and outflank the foe in order to achieve victory.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of the Fight phaseTARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was eligible to fight this phase.EFFECT: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6", or up to 12" if it is a MOUNTED unit. Otherwise, your unit can make a Fall Back move. It cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move if it disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.
stratagems.when: End of the Fight phase
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was eligible to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6", or up to 12" if it is a MOUNTED unit. Otherwise, your unit can make a Fall Back move. It cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move if it disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.

stratagems.name: REAVERS’ HASTE
stratagems.legend: The prospect of riches spurs these renegade warriors forwards. Woe betide any in their path.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it  Advanced. If you select one or more units within range of an objective marker as a target of that charge, add 1 to the Charge roll.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it  Advanced. If you select one or more units within range of an objective marker as a target of that charge, add 1 to the Charge roll.

stratagems.name: WARPCHARGED ENGINES
stratagems.legend: The engines of this vehicle or construct crackle with the raw energies of the immaterium, propelling it forward or incredible speed.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES TRANSPORT or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, if your unit  Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES TRANSPORT or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit  Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.name: DESPERATE PLEDGE
stratagems.legend: A daemon construct may beseech the Arkifane for further aid, adding to its soul debt in return for greater might.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, if your unit invokes its contract, each time it makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit invokes its contract, each time it makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: DAEMONIC POSSESION
stratagems.legend: Those steeped in techno-sorcery may trammel daemonic entities within mechanical constructs.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE unit from your army (excluding DAEMON units).EFFECT: Until the end of the battle, your unit has the DAEMON keyword.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE unit from your army (excluding DAEMON units).
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the battle, your unit has the DAEMON keyword.

stratagems.name: UNSTOPPABLE RAMPAGE
stratagems.legend: The tortured machine spirits of Heretic Astartes vehicles are driven forward by their anguish.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase or Charge phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE or VASHTORR THE ARKIFANE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes Normal, Advance or charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features as if they were not there.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE or VASHTORR THE ARKIFANE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes Normal, Advance or charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features as if they were not there.

stratagems.name: GLUT OF SOULS
stratagems.legend: Wrh each soul harvested the bound daemon comes closer to settling its contract and earning freedom.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON VEHICLE unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, if your unit invokes its contract, each time it makes an attack that destroys an enemy model, roll one D6: on 5+, your unit regains 1 lost wound after all of its attacks have been resolved (to a maximum of 6 wound).

stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON VEHICLE unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that has not been selected to fight this phase.

stratagems.name: PREDATORY PURSUIT
stratagems.legend: Corrupted Heretic Astartes Vehicles Pursue their prey with an animalistic determination.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall back move.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE or VASHTORR THE ARKIFANE unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6", but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

stratagems.name: FEEDING FRENZY
stratagems.legend: The daemonic entities at the heart of possessed vehicles hunger for the life force of their enemies.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, when an enemy unit (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON VEHICLE or VASHTORR THE ARKIFANE unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) that is within Engagement Range of your units Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, of that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, substract 1 from each of those tests.

stratagems.name: FLEETING MIGHT
stratagems.legend: For one tantalising instant, the dark prayers of these fanatics are answered by some infernal warp patron, placing the power to slay champions in their hands.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a DAMNED unit from your army makes a Dark Pact.TARGET: That DAMNED unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

stratagems.target: That DAMNED unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

stratagems.name: INFERNAL ALTARS
stratagems.legend: Whether heretical fanes unveiled amidst the rebellion or heaped corpses and votive offerings, these ritual foci lend the faithful supernatural protection.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DAMNED unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if your unit is within range of an objective marker, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against that attack. If your unit has the CULTIST MOB keyword, models in it have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against that attack instead.

stratagems.name: STORM THE BRIDGE!
stratagems.legend: Seizing their opportunity to strike a fatal blow against those who have oppressed them for so long - and please the Dark Gods in the process - these heretics surge forwards with zealous ferocity.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One DAMNED or CHAOS SPAWN unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.target: One DAMNED or CHAOS SPAWN unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: CRUDE SABOTAGE
stratagems.legend: Using charged rigged from scavenged junk and pollutant runoff, the fanatical masses blast open the hatchways that bar their paths to ascension.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One CULTIST MOB or DAMNED CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Select one closed Hatchway within 1“ of your unit. Your unit can attempt to operate that Hatchway.RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot attempt to operate a Hatchway again.

stratagems.name: LET THE GALAXY BURN
stratagems.type: Veterans of the Long War – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: No barricade or fortification is proof against the vengeful fury of these hate-fuelled murderers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding TZEENTCH units) that has not been selected to shoot this phaseEFFECT: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and change the Attacks characteristic of Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit to 6.

stratagems.name: CONTEMPTUOUS DISREGARD
stratagems.type: Veterans of the Long War – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Such embittered warriors as these shrug off hails of enemy fire with arrogant disdain.

stratagems.name: ENDLESS IRE
stratagems.type: Veterans of the Long War – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: No amount of bloodshed can truly satisfy this bitter champion's desire for vengeance.

Until the start of your next Command phase, that enemy unit is considered to be your focus of hatred.

stratagems.name: BRINGERS OF DESPAIR
stratagems.type: Veterans of the Long War – Epic Deed Stratagem

stratagems.name: MILLENNIA OF EXPERIENCE
stratagems.type: Veterans of the Long War – Strategic Ploy Stratagem

stratagems.name: BLACK CRUSADE
stratagems.type: Veterans of the Long War – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Warmaster s Black Crusade grinds ever onwards without restraint or remorse.

stratagems.name: IMPERIOUS ADVANCE
stratagems.type: Champions of Chaos – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Attempting to bar the path of these chosen warriors only fills them with a cruel and arrogant desire to crush those who stand in their way.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Select any number of models in your unit. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the selected models, and each time you select targets for attacks made by those models, they must target an enemy unit that is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from them.

stratagems.name: AGGRESSIVE STRIKE
stratagems.type: Champions of Chaos – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Veterans of countless teleport assaults, these warriors burst from the warp already striding, firing and bellowing praise to the Dark Gods
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your Movement phase.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that arrived using the Deep Strike ability this turn.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.name: INFERNAL PATRONS
stratagems.type: Champions of Chaos – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Many chosen warriors of the Dark Gods have forged pacts with minor daemonic entities, gaining their insidious aid to terrify and disorient the foe in battle.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase, just after your opponent targets a unit from their army with a Stratagem.TARGET: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army within 3" of and visible to that enemy unit.EFFECT: That enemy unit must take a Leadership test; if failed, that usage of that Stratagem has no effect (your opponent cannot use that Stratagem again this phase).

stratagems.name: MALIGN WILL
stratagems.type: Champions of Chaos – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: These warriors' will to conquer and despoil is so great that it manifests through the dark power of the warp into a corporeal blight upon realspace.

If there are no enemy units within range of that objective marker (excluding Battle-shocked units], that objective marker is Secured by your army.

stratagems.name: CRAZED FOCUS

stratagems.name: INFERNAL SACRIFICE
stratagems.legend: Those in thrall to the Dark Gods will gladly sacrifice their lives to draw the eye of their darkling patrons.

stratagems.name: CHOSEN FOR GLORY
stratagems.legend: Within the massed ranks of a heretic cult, only a few are marked for greatness.

If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if your unit did not fail the resulting Leadership test when making that Desperate Pact, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if your unit did not fail the resulting Leadership test when making that Desperate Pact, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.name: MORTAL THRALLS
stratagems.legend: Disciples of the Chaos Gods think nothing of sacrificing their lesser thralls to protect those of greater worth.

stratagems.name: RECKLESS HASTE
stratagems.legend: Consumed by a desire to spill blood, these fanatical heretics hurl themselves towards the foe.
